Good morning, Grey-Sloan.
Richard Webber, here,
...chief medical officer for the Catherine Fox Foundation.
And at times, we even need you
to isolate from the people you love.
This time has been extremely difficult.
Many members of our staff have been unable
to see their families,
we've struggled with supplies,
and we've lost more patients than we could ever imagine.
I'm so sorry.
I gotta say, it's a definite improvement
from his last on-screen performance.
Only two people in the lounge at a time. COVID protocol.

Along with our patients,
we need to take care of each other.
That's why I'm pleased to announce

to secure enough COVID tests for the entire staff.
Today, we will be testing hospital-wide.
It is not an option.
Additionally, and effective immediately,
residents will not be able to go into rooms

That's half the hospital's patient intake!

that we control the hospital's transmission rate

Oh, and speaking of residents,
please let's give our new class of interns a warm welcome.
And they have graciously agreed to start early
to help us in our time of need.
We have to press pause

No joy if you want to survive.

Hey. Okay. Present.
Patient was admitted for respiratory support

Hey.
